hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Game Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Water Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple After Wind Enemy Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #0# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #Big Skulltula# guarding a Gold one.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Lizalfos Maze Side Room Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #2# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a solitary #Cow#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that Epona is an exceptional horse. Able to clear canyons in a single bound.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Serenade of Water# and #a Red Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: Have you seen my dodongo? Very large, eats everything, responds to "King".^Call Darunia in Goron City if found. Huge rupee reward!

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #1# major item.
